tuning_runs.notes: OVER BUDGET by 6.9 min. Score -0.0098 vs baseline.
OVER BUDGET by 11 min. Score -0.0189 vs baseline. Fewer fevals = worse score + more time (overhead dominated).
OVER BUDGET by 9.8 min. Score -0.0241 vs baseline. Even 4 inits is too many.

key_finding: More initializations DO NOT help. Each additional init adds overhead (more CMA-ES instances, more fine-grid evaluations) that outweighs any benefit. Baseline (2 inits with smart+triangulation) is already optimal.
